note: He gives the geographical position of Iceland as follows ( I quote the edition of Antwerp, 1553): " Medium eius 7.0—65.30 | Harsol ciui. 7.40 —60.42 I Thirtes ciui. 5.50—64.44 | Nadar ciui. 6.40—57.20." In all the editions I have seen (Antwerp, 1553, 1574, and 1584) there is added Gemma Frisius' (1508—ca. 1555) description of Iceland.
title: the famous Danish astronomer, gathered students around him on the island of Hveen, where he had his magnificent residence and observatory.
